additionalRowClass: =if([$_ComplianceTag] == 'User retained non record 1 year' && (Number(@now) - Number(Date([$_ComplianceTagWrittenTime]))) / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24) > 335, 'sp-field-severity--severeWarning', if([$_ComplianceTag] == 'Non record' && (Number(@now) - Number([$Modified])) / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24) > 1065, 'sp-field-severity--severeWarning', if([$_ComplianceTag] == 'User retained non record 3 years' && (Number(@now) - Number(Date([$_ComplianceTagWrittenTime]))) / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24) > 1065, 'sp-field-severity--severeWarning', if([$_ComplianceTag] == 'User retained non record 5 years' && (Number(@now) - Number(Date([$_ComplianceTagWrittenTime]))) / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24) > 1795, 'sp-field-severity--severeWarning', ''))))
